verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Twaileta sadaka,
twaileta sadaka,
twaileta sadaka,
twaomba pokea Baba. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mkate pia divai,
kazi ya mikono yetu,
twaomba uyabariki,
twaomba pokea Bwana.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mazao ya mashambani,
na fedha za mifukoni,
na kazi tunazofanya,
twaomba pokea Bwana.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Matendo yenye huruma,
wanayotenda wenzetu,
twaomba uyabariki,
twaomba pokea Bwana.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Na nyimbo tunazoimba,
twaomba zikupendeze,
pia ziwe sala zetu
twaomba pokea Bwana.
